notes: [Added] Added a color dropdown to the Example-1 configuration.
[Improved] The plugin's default configuration now uses the new textual style buttons. Removed the media query to show icons for smaller viewport widths.
[Improved] Disabled button active state styles, they only worked for `<strong>` and `<em>` buttons.
[Improved] Dropdown styles for default and example configs updated for Redactor II 1.1.
[Fixed] Prevent line-breaks button now uses `<nobr>` tags, it's currently not possible to add `<span>` tags.
[Fixed] Fixed the editor styles for `<kbd>` and `<nobr>`.
[Added] It's now possible to configure the buttons and dropdowns the plugin adds to the toolbar, this replaces the now deprecated `buttonsInlineStyles` config setting.
[Added] It's now possible to add icons to any toolbar button.
[Added] Added a button to remove all inline styles.
[Added] Toolbar icons and the editor styles can now be customized with the `iconsFile` and `cssFile` config setting.
[Improved] Toolbar icons are now implemented with SVG.
